short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert your MITx modules into nice pdfs for note-taking eom

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This little extension adds a "Download" button to each of your modules at MITx to convert it into PDF. Then, just import them to your Notability of whatever you're using for taking notes and voila, you've got yourself all the class-notes well and organized. Not that I'd encourage skipping lectures but it did help me a lot to not miss any material. Hope it helps you too!
